channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Verizon chief talent officer says Gen Z grads shouldn’t snub retail or hospitality jobs in the current economy: ‘Just start somewhere’
item.description: As AI steals entry-level office jobs, Verizon’s chief talent officer says Gen Z grads should be 'open to a different path.' Namely, retail and hospita...

item.title: Singapore-based startup founder Anand Roy thinks generative AI can help fix a broken music sector
item.description: Roy started Wubble in 2024; now his generated tunes are used by global giants and even the Taipei Metro, to soothe harried commuters.

item.title: What Trump's plan to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds means for mortgage rates
Could ‘Trump accounts’ make your kids millionaires? Maybe — with this strategy.
Glencore soars in opening London trade on talks on possible $200 bln merger
Mass shootings on campus give rise to a new kind of life-saving service journalism: an anonymous message board called Sidechat
item.description: Described by Harvard Magazine as “the College’s stream of collective consciousness,” Sidechat allows anyone with a verified university email to post.

item.title: Tennessee theater professor reinstated, with $500,000 settlement, after losing his job over a Charlie Kirk-related social media post
item.description: Sen. Marsha Blackburn had circulated a screenshot indicating the professor had posted a headline about Charlie Kirk's stance on the 2nd Amendment.

item.title: From George Floyd to Trump calling Somali immigrants ‘garbage’ to a fatal ICE shooting, Minnesota’s in the crosshairs
item.description: In June, a Democratic state lawmaker and her husband were assassinated by a Trump supporter, although conservatives blame Tim Walz.

item.title: Tech is slumping, but these sectors and stocks are off to a fast start to 2026
Stocks face first real test of 2026 with jobs report, possible tariff ruling
